abstract: Perhaps no team is better at exploiting mismatches than the Patriots, whose excellent tight-end tandem of Rob Gronkowski and Aaron Hernandez shredded the Jets last year.
snippet: Perhaps no team is better at exploiting mismatches than the Patriots, whose excellent tight-end tandem of Rob Gronkowski and Aaron Hernandez shredded the Jets last year.
lead_paragraph: Jets (2-2) at Patriots (3-1), 4:15 p.m. Eastern, CBSMATCHUP TO WATCH: Patriots tight ends vs. Jets defense

headline.main: Jets at Patriots: Matchup to Watch
